snippet: DUKE--Robin, Hon. Appeal of Conscience Foundation mourns Ambassador Robin Chandler Duke, long-time trustee, who with her husband Ambassador Angier Biddle Duke, past Chairman of the Board, were committed to strengthening religious freedom, human rights and tolerance. Our deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier, President Archbishop K. Barsamian, Cardinal T. McCarrick, Vice Presidents 1/3
lead_paragraph: DUKE--Robin, Hon. Appeal of Conscience Foundation mourns Ambassador Robin Chandler Duke, long-time trustee, who with her husband Ambassador Angier Biddle Duke, past Chairman of the Board, were committed to strengthening religious freedom, human rights and tolerance. Our deepest sympathy to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier, President Archbishop K. Barsamian, Cardinal T. McCarrick, Vice Presidents 1/3
